West_Des_Moines.Des Moines International Airport:
Des Moines International Airport (IATA: DSM, ICAO: KDSM, FAA LID: DSM) is a civil-military public airport three miles southwest of Des Moines, in Polk County, Iowa, United States. It has 21 connections to major airline hubs.
This airport is in the National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2017–2021, which called it a primary commercial service airport.
